DOC.brief_summary: The purpose small , short pilot study determine feasibility ( e.g. , recruitment , dose acceptance , retention ) future longer trial compare effect two type omega-3 fat fish oil plasma triglyceride . The two type fish oil compose ( 1 ) omega-3 fatty acid triglyceride form ; ( 2 ) esterify free fatty acid ( i.e . ethyl ester . Although two type fish oil supplement available public , remain unclear whether equally effective lower plasma triglyceride .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Fish Oil Plasma Triglycerides Adults
DOC.detailed_description: Eligibility first determine telephone screen on-line screening tool . Those potential subject meet eligibility criterion telephone on-line require make two clinic visit GCRC provide two blood sample within 1-week window , use determine eligibility . Those still eligible blood analysis invite attend group orientation session . The rationale study entire protocol discuss group orientation , hold approximately twice/month . Informed consent obtain question answer . Those sign informed consent randomize block 10 ( 3/assignment group : fish oil triglyceride form , fish oil ethyl ester , placebo ) . Baseline measurement include : Blood sampling ( twice within 1-week window ) Questionnaires ( specifically dietary assessment questionnaire ) The assessment collect 12 week randomization . An additional blood sample collect 4 8 week . Four-week supply study tablet distribute baseline week 4 8 . Blood sample do General Clinical Research Center/CTRU train nurse . All study procedure involve minimal negligible risk .
DOC.criteria: *Gender : Both woman men Age : > = 18 year Ethnicity race : All ethnic racial background welcome Fasting blood triglyceride great equal 150 mg/dL Planning available clinic visit 12 week study participation Ability willingness give write informed consent No known active psychiatric illness . *At screening : Daily intake dietary supplement contain omega3 FAs within past month . Fasting blood glucose great equal 126 mg/dL Self report personal history : Clinically significant atherosclerosis ( e.g. , CAD , PAD ) Malignant neoplasm Subjects currently receive follow medication ( self report ) : Lipid lower drug include statin Antihypertensive drug : betablockers thiazide Body Mass Index ( BMI ) great equal 40 . Pregnant Lactating Inability communicate effectively study personnel
